title: Huma Abedin | Jan. 6 Committee Subpoenas Rudy Giuliani; NY AG Details Trump Fraud Case: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the January 6 commission subpoenaing several key Trump allies (including Rudy Giuliani) and the New York State attorney general revealing her office has uncovered evidence of possible fraud committed by Trump’s businesses.

Then, Huma Abedin talks about her book Both/And, her marriage to Anthony Weiner and working with Hillary Clinton.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
